messages.message: CC: @Ashish for help on this topic.

@Chris Cowell in that case we should have a note on our docs page stating the functions that are handwritten notes and ones that in the yaml file. I dont think our customers would know that by default.

The fundamental problem is that we have API operations that are not represented in our API  specification. The yaml file is, as the SocGen situation attests, not only for generating docs, but is also used for testing, SDK code generation, and importantly, customer integrations. We can add information to help users understand the gaps (letâ€™s discuss this @Chris Cowell ), but to be enterprise-ready, our spec should be complete.
